title: Google Tag Manager
shortDescription: Add google tag manager and exclude it on pages
longDescription:
Add Google Tag Manager to all pages. Only GTM Id is needed. (It starts with GTM-******)

Features:
- Added scripts of google tag manager in head as well as body.  //As per google requirment
- Added Ablility to exclude URL
- Added Regex to Exclusion

Known Problems:
1. Wordpress admin's Add post pages will become blank.
(Exclude Wordpress admin url to fix it.)

Requirement:
Only a google tag manager ID is required which starts with GTM-******.

Additional Info:
No permission and no user details are needed.

Project Type:
It is a opensource project. Comments are welcomed to fix unforeseem bugs..
Feature requests are werlcomed.

Repo:
https://github.com/Prashant-Elango/CloudflareApps--GoogletagManager

Google Tag Manager and its logo are owned by google.
instructions: Wordpress users must exclude Admin URL.
author: Prashant Elango

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

proposedApp.title: Google Tag Manager
proposedApp.shortDescription: Just Installs google tag manager with specified Id.
proposedApp.longDescription:
There already exists an app of similar kind but it requires to share Cloudflare email address with them.
I feel insecure on sharing the confidential email address. So, I developed this to solve my problem.

I had made the mini project open source and will get actively maintained by me.

Features:
- Added scripts of google tag manager in head as well as body.  //As per google requirment

Requirement:
Only a google tag manager ID is required which starts with GTM-******.

Additional Info:
No permission and no user details are needed.
proposedApp.author: Prashant Elango

exclude_url.description: Sometime google tag can cause problem in certain pages such as wordpress admnin's Add Post which causes a blank screen.  Url or Regex
exclude_url.title: Exclude pages and domain from installing Google Tags

versions.releaseNotes:
Added support to exclude pages (URL or domain) from places where it shouldn't be.

This feature is added to prevent Google Tag Manager from causing problem on certain location's such as wordpress admin dashboard.
